content.p: We organise a number of sector-specific careers fairs throughout the year so you can attract a wide range of students or target certain disciplines. Our fairs attract local, national and international companies and organisations, all with one aim: to recruit our high-quality students and graduates. Visit this page Date: Tuesday 11 February, 2025 Location: The Welcome Zone, Portland Building, University Park Book your place Date: Monday 10 March, 2025 Location: The Great Hall, Trent Building, University Park telephone: +44 (0) 115 82 32233 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: recruiterservices@nottingham.ac.uk
